channel.title: Plant Disease Epidemiology
channel.description: Recent content on Plant Disease Epidemiology

item.title: Are you a modeler or computational plant pathologist? Then let's connect and code together!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (PDE)
item.description: Since the early times, plant pathologists faced the need to deal with data and and quantitative analysis using mathematics and, more recently, computational tools. The leaders in the field were a relatively small international group of scientists with various backgrounds related to plant pathology that felt the need to connect and then Plant Disease Epidemiology was formally recognized as a discipline more than 50 years ago.

item.title: Open Plant Pathology
item.author: youremail@domain.com (PDE)
item.description: The Open Plant Pathology is community of computational scientists who values the sharing of knowledge, ideas and data; building capacity; and promotes open and reproducible research to benefit plant epidemiologists. To foster this community, we propose to develop:
